messages.message:
For an email upstream integration, if we have multiple emails being pulled via a scheduled run, should all those emails be included in 1 run or should we map 1 email --> 1 run?
cc @andy @Weiming Wu @Kaustubh (KD) @jack.robbins
Right now, it seems we're doing multiple emails --> 1 run which I believe is confusing since 1 email may only correspond to 1 "packet"
It sounds like it should be a configurable option
Ack that actually, yeah maybe it should be configurable. Seems like an easy win as well

Looks like that was initially considered but not implemented: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1LaaxuQYc_Q7CKftoLELtAUWXpQGHMvZYV9vNqAubk9Y/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.8wgdjw2kxp4v

this feature was built before a lot of the case management details were finalized, which could be why we didn't build in that configuration
Yeah this was actually built before we spec-ed out case management but I agree with whats been mentioned too
